home.subtitle: Gameplay Programmer in training
home.description: French student passionate about video game development.
home.aboutText1: Currently in 2nd year of Bachelor of Computer Science at Le Puy-en-Velay, I specialize in the development of video-games specifically in gameplay programming.
home.aboutText2: My goal is to contribute to innovative projects and continue to develop my skills in the video game industry.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Don't hesitate to contact me via the platforms below!

libet.description: 3D Game at the first person in which the player embodies 'Libet', an old man with Alzheimer, living his life while he gradually loses reason.

projectMycoria.description: 3D game of exploration and narrative wandering in the Livradois-Forez region. Play as Vincent Morel, a DGSI officer, charged with committing to a series of mysterious disappearances.

iplat.description: Short 2D platform game developed in 1 week with the Lo<unk> ve2D framework.

botSteam.description: Bot Discord permettant de suivre les soldes Steam et recevoir des notifications pour vos jeux favoris.

webSoutenances.description: Web application developed to facilitate the management of defenses at the University.
